author: Lex Briscuso
description: We’re finally getting a taste of what lies beyond The Rise of Skywalker — but not from Shawn Levy. Yet, at least. While the Deadpool and Wolverine filmmaker’s upcoming Star Wars film Star Wars: Starfighter is still highly anticipated, fans will now get to explore the Star Wars universe in the aftermath of the 2019 film a little sooner, through a new young adult novel titled Star Wars: The Last Order.
title: New Star Wars Novel Will Explore the Post-Rise of Skywalker Universe For The First Time

description: The Backbone Pro smartly improves nearly every feature that made the original great. With full-size thumbsticks, upgraded triggers, customizable rear buttons, and near-silent inputs, it easily earns its “Pro” moniker. FlowState is the real game-changer here, letting you connect to even more screens over Bluetooth, making this the only controller you’ll need for mobile and cloud gaming.
title: Backbone Pro Review

description: Microsoft’s multiplatform strategy is clearly paying off when it comes to launching its games on PlayStation 5 as well as Xbox Series X and S and PC, with The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered, Minecraft, and Forza Horizon 5 dominating Sony's sales charts.

description: The more people playing the pound-for-pound champ of open world racing, the merrier.

description: It's one thing to successfully translate a secret in-game video game language, but it's quite another to translate it before the game is even out – yet that's exactly what YouTuber 2Chrispy has (somehow) managed to do in Donkey Kong Bananza.
title: Turns Out Donkey Kong Bananza Has a Secret Language — And It Has Already Been Translated

description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is now up to 2 million copies sold after 12 days on sale. That’s up from the 1 million sold three days after launch. It's a big hit for French developer Sandfall Interactive.

description: Nintendo is suing accessory firm Genki for trademark infringement after it shared renders of a Nintendo Switch 2 "mockup" months before Nintendo revealed official images of its new console.

description: As if impressive Steam concurrent player numbers and Bethesda’s own announcement of 4 million players wasn’t enough to cement it as a hit, The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered is already the third best-selling game of 2025 in the U.S. after just one week on sale.
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Is Already the 3rd Best-Selling Game of 2025 in the U.S., Behind Only Monster Hunter: Wilds and Assassin's Creed: Shadows.
